lead_paragraph: WILKES--David R. It is with a profound sense of loss and sorrow that we note the passing of David R. Wilkes on June 18, in Los Angeles. Beloved husband to Ruth; father to Stephen, Bette, Donald, Kimberly, Sharon and Robert; grandfather to Jennie, Sam, Jacob, Rachel, Michaela and Aliya. Born in Providence, RI, David was an innovative pioneer in the food and flavoring business. From his work on developing K-rations during WWII to creating some of the most beloved ice cream and soda flavors such as, Haagen Dazs coffee ice cream and Dr. Browns black cherry soda, he was a creative inspiration to us all. He was defined by hard work, passion and empathy, but his first priority was always his family. You will always be in our hearts Opa. Services to be held at Lincoln Park Cemetery Chapel, Tuesday, June 21, 10:30am, 1469 Post Road, Warwick, RI. 1/3
